text: Doctor Gen is patient, kind & as genuine as they come! He really has a heart for his patients & it shows in the way he manages their conditions holistically. Gentle yet assertive, he takes the time to understand his patients & work with them to address their pain/symptoms :) 100% recommend for anyone looking for a good bone/sports doctor!

Dr. Foo was fantastic! He was upfront and honest with his answers to all my questions, even though it was just a second opinion visit. His clear communication and direct feedback gave me the confidence to make an informed decision right away. Highly recommended!

I recently had the privilege of being treated by Dr. Foo, an exceptional orthopaedic surgeon. His expertise and compassionate approach made the entire experience seamless. From the initial consultation to post-operative care, Dr. Foo attention to detail and commitment to patient well-being were evident. The surgery was a success, and I am grateful for his skillful hands and reassuring demeanor. I highly recommend Dr. Foo to anyone seeking top-notch orthopaedic treatment .

I recently saw Doctor Foo to assist me with my recurring foot pain. I specialise in customer experience for a living and Dr Foo shone the lights out delivering a personalised, empathetic, clear diagnosis and future steps I will never forget! He has checked up with me post my appointment which is almost unheard of nowadays! Definitely recommended!
